Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 3 Āsavagocchaka » 3.3 Āsavasampayuttaduka » 3.3.7 Pañhāvāra » 3.3.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
107.
1254Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava…pe…  nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye nava…pe…  namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
